item.title: Auto-generation of Documentation Website

item.title: Version 2.3 Upgrade Guide
item.description: There have been a lot of changes and improvements coming through the pipeline recently with react-native-elements. So in preparing for a version 3, there are some planned deprecations that will be added into version 2.3 and then removed in version 3.

item.title: React Native Elements 1.0
item.description: React Native Elements has UI elements that are easy to use & really customizable. It also has theming, platform specific search bars, React Native Web support, and much more.
